Package coal

Class Camera

java.lang.Object
coal.Camera
public class Camera extends Object
This class represents a camera object

  • Method Details

    • getViewMatrix

      public org.joml.Matrix4f getViewMatrix()
      Calculates and returns the view matrix for the camera. The view matrix defines the transformation from world coordinates to camera coordinates.
      Returns:
      The view matrix.

    • getProjectionMatrix

      public org.joml.Matrix4f getProjectionMatrix()
      Returns the projection matrix for the camera. The projection matrix defines the transformation from camera coordinates to screen coordinates.
      Returns:
      The projection matrix.

    • getInverseProjectionMatrix

      public org.joml.Matrix4f getInverseProjectionMatrix()
      Returns the inverse of the projection matrix. The inverse projection matrix is used for transforming coordinates from screen space back to camera coordinates.
      Returns:
      The inverse projection matrix.

    • getInverseViewMatrix

      public org.joml.Matrix4f getInverseViewMatrix()
      Returns the inverse of the view matrix. The inverse view matrix is used for transforming coordinates from camera space back to world coordinates.
      Returns:
      The inverse view matrix.

    • getPosition

      public org.joml.Vector2f getPosition()
      Get the 2d position of the camera
      Returns:
      the position

    • getProjectionSize

      public org.joml.Vector2f getProjectionSize()
      Get the projection size
      Returns:
      the projection size
